mapper.select: select role_code from sys_role where del_flag = 0 AND sys_role_id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = (select sys_user_id from sys_user where login_name=#{loginName}) )

select * from sys_role r
r.del_flag = 0
and r.role_name like concat('%',#{query.roleName},'%')
order by r.sort
